name: Green and Grey YouTube
description:
Changes things to be green and grey. Not too overpowering.
I made this theme for myself. Thought others might enjoy it too.
additional_info:
Items changed.
-YouTube logo
-Loading bar
-Progress bar in videos
-HD button in videos
-Volume bar in videos
-Tab underlines
-Subscribe Button
-Upload button on upload page
-Header Bar
-Search Box
-Search Button
-Upload Button
-Highlighted sections on sidebar
-Font colour on sidebar
-Creator studio images and highlighting
-Some other things I've probably forgotten.
